mapper.select: SELECT TP.TRAVEL_PLAN_NO, TP.MEMBER_NO, TRAVEL_PLAN_TITLE, START_YMD, END_YMD, DP.DETAIL_PLAN_NO, DETAIL_PLAN_YMD, DETAIL_PLAN_HOUR, DETAIL_PLAN_HOUR_END, COLOR, PL.PLACE_NO, PLACE_CATEGORY, PLACE_NAME, ROAD_NAME_ADR, LOT_NUMBER_ADR, SCORE, AREA, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, PR.PLACE_REVIEW_NO, PLACE_REVIEW_IMG, PLACE_REVIEW_CONTENT, PLACE_REVIEW_SCORE, WRITE_DATE FROM TRAVEL_PLAN_TB TP LEFT JOIN DETAIL_PLAN_TB DP ON TP.TRAVEL_PLAN_NO = DP.TRAVEL_PLAN_NO LEFT JOIN DETAIL_PLAN_BLOCK_TB DB ON DP.DETAIL_PLAN_NO = DB.DETAIL_PLAN_NO LEFT JOIN PLACE_TB PL ON DP.PLACE_NO = PL.PLACE_NO LEFT JOIN PLACE_REVIEW_TB PR ON DP.DETAIL_PLAN_NO = PR.DETAIL_PLAN_NO WHERE TP.TRAVEL_PLAN_NO = #{travelPlanNo} ORDER BY TP.MEMBER_NO, DP.DETAIL_PLAN_YMD, DETAIL_PLAN_HOUR, DP.DETAIL_PLAN_NO
